Package moteur

Class Arbitre

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Arbitre
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor
    public class Arbitre
extends java.lang.Object
implements Visitor
    The interface Visitor is the implementation of the Design Pattern "Visitor". And the classe Arbitre implements the interface Visitor. An Arbitre is able to check every player's Jest in order to calculate everyone's point, by using the methode checkJest. Thus, the Arbitre needs to use the Design Pattern Visitor.

      int checkJest​(Player player)
      checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.

      • checkJest

        public int checkJest​(Player player)
        checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.
        Specified by:
        checkJest in interface Visitor
        Parameters:
        player - is an instance of a Player, whatever a real player or a virtual one.
        Returns:
        type of an integer, which is the total points of the jest of the player which we indicated as a parameter
